pages.text:
Eighth & Hays – Wine Bar & Brick Oven
232 Creative
2025-07-01T14:52:50+00:00
EIGHTH & HAYS
Eighth & Hays is a family-owned and operated wine and craft cocktail bar in Homestead, PA.  Just six miles from downtown Pittsburgh, Eighth & Hays offers our guests the highest quality wines, craft cocktails, and cuisine.
Conveniently located just blocks from The Waterfront.
WINE
Eighth & Hays offers nine house wines and features and a revolving list of 16 climate-controlled wines from across the globe. We pride ourselves on offering our patrons both the classic domestic wines and premium international wines not typically available in western PA establishments.
For the most up-to-date wine selections, visit
Eighth & Hays Facebook Page
.
COCKTAILS
Eighth & Hays offers our guests ten signature cocktails. When creating our signature drinks, we use creativity, the finest liquors and the freshest fruits and ingredients.
CUISINE
We thoughtfully crafted the perfect cuisine to pair with our wine and craft cocktail selections.  Eighth & Hays will satisfy your food cravings, whether it's with our charcuterie, fine cheeses, fresh salads, wood-fired pizzas, paninis, or homemade desserts.
DINNER MENU
HOURS
WEDNESDAY
4PM - 10PM
THURSDAY
4PM - 10PM
FRIDAY
4PM - 10PM
SATURDAY
4PM - 10PM
Sorry, we're closed Sunday-Tuesday.
We will be closed the week of July 4th, reopening Wednesday, July 9th
SPECIALS
Check our social media pages, Google business page, or call for our weekly rotating entree/app features!
Wednesday-Thursday:
All night $40 Any house bottle of wine and any pizza
Wednesday Thursday:
5 pm - 7 pm $2 off craft cocktails and premium glasses of wine
Friday:
5 pm - 7 pm $2 off craft cocktails and premium glasses of wine
Friday:
Half meat and cheese board and house bottle of wine for $50 (All Night)
RESERVATIONS
We're only accepting reservations for parties of 6 or more. Reservations can only be made by phone (412-326-0009) or email (eighthandhays@gmail.com).
In the event you are unable to make your reservation, we kindly ask that you provide us with 24-hour notice for cancellations and please contact us as soon as possible if you need to make any changes.
For large parties, we may require a credit card to hold your reservation. If your party does not show up for your reservation, you will be charged a $50 penalty fee.
Gratuity may be added to parties of 6 or more.
JOIN THE TEAM
Want to join the family at Eighth & Hays?
Click here to learn about the positions we have open.
EMPLOYMENT
CONTACT US
130 W Eighth Ave, Homestead, PA 15120
(412) 326-0009
eighthandhays@gmail.com
